data.text:
How to get on top of @LaTourEiffel ?
Just ask @flashboy_mp4 ⚡🛸
#letslove https://t.co/Nm5NUdJUZC
DECEMBER 4th!!! So excited to finally announce this rad project with @davidguetta and @MORTENofficial 🤩 Mark your calendars, folks.. https://t.co/BB1JMSlwmB

With more than 50 million records sold, and more than 10 billion streams, no one can question the success of DJ, producer and songwriter @davidguetta. Hear him, along with producer, writer and journalist @timkash, at #WebSummit next week 🎧

https://t.co/zvtg548Uaj https://t.co/lxBwhAKA4u

Get ready for the 'Save My Live' music video. Premiering this Friday 9am UK.

@davidguetta @MORTENofficial https://t.co/u9zRqmFzrM
🇫🇷 À ce soir ☺️ https://t.co/n6YaldhKGy
.@davidguetta got a birthday gift from the MTV EMAs as he gets named the Best Electronic act + performs live with @raye | 📸: @rukes https://t.co/NmwDwFxA56 https://t.co/JIm6LPLGxr

#LetsLove by @davidguetta & @Sia is currently the 2nd BEST SELLING song on iTunes Europe & the 7th BEST SELLING song on iTunes Worldwide ❤️

KEEP BUYING! 

https://t.co/RH6tEsm4s7
Cover boy 😜 https://t.co/bpnmgTS9Fz
.@davidguetta et @raye ont mis le feu aux #MTVEMA avec un light show magique pour "Let's Love" ➡ https://t.co/zIeZM1SQ8i https://t.co/zbgbVKb5JH
Watch @DavidGuetta and @Raye illuminate the #MTVEMA sky with "Let’s Love" https://t.co/CqxC0TCHSe
Check it out 🙌🏼 https://t.co/UNDMM0UDEn
What a crazy weekend 🙏🏼🥰🙏🏼🥰🙏🏼 https://t.co/mVej1LrxhS
Awhhhh @davidguetta! Congrats https://t.co/KkD6qG7FKZ
Let’s Love 🥰🥰 https://t.co/WqAjXw49bN

From the bottom of my heart ❤️ Thank you so much for voted me #1 Dj this year. 
I couldn't have wished for a better birthday gift 🙌🏼🙌🏼🙌🏼 https://t.co/qnjzRgytlv
🥰🥰🥰 https://t.co/G75Y67RKoW
TONIGHT!!! 🙌🏼🙌🏼🙌🏼 https://t.co/ILF34ZjlOO
Thanks bro’ 🥰🥰🥰 https://t.co/1nwSi1yG4o
Thanks for this amazing remix bro' 🙏 https://t.co/ax2GRwt4WI
.@robin_schulz slayed his remix for @davidguetta and @Sia 🔥 https://t.co/QKkIntJ06x

🚨 Announcement Update 🚨

We have new lineup of presenters...
✨ @AnneMarie 
✨ @BigSean 
✨ @LewisHamilton 

with appearances by...
✨ @raye 
✨ @BarbaraPalvin 
✨ @djkhaled 
✨ @AyaNakamuraa 

and @davidguetta will be taking the #MTVEMA stage from Budapest, Hungary!! https://t.co/zQtOeIyLOs

AMF presents Top 100 DJs Awards is this Saturday & we are counting down last year's Top 10! Last year's no.3 DJ is future rave pioneer @davidguetta  ⚡The icon is joining us for a massive night on Saturday so make sure to tune in on https://t.co/qqH2IakPtv as we own the night! https://t.co/ar35Gmnwnj

Spent a big part of quarantine pushing my boundaries sound-wise and finishing this amazing remix! Thank you @davidguetta and @Sia for the opportunity!! Brand new CESQEAUX remix out now, go check it out NOW: https://t.co/dLOJc8rTTJ https://t.co/dZnuw4jDDr

Tomorrow @davidguetta @mortenofficial bring their infectious FUTURE RAVE sound to the #Top101Producers2020 Mainstage for their first ever b2b! ⚡️⚡️⚡️⁣
⁣
Will we see you there? https://t.co/yIFlsBJdbJ https://t.co/znNkMXuCLw
See you there guys 😊 https://t.co/SuufdKijXB

.@davidguetta and @MORTENofficial give their future rave treatment to David Guetta and @Sia's hit single "Let's Love" 💚
https://t.co/6ISS2esL9U https://t.co/NJkzOhO02V

This is how we do it with my bro’ @mortenofficial! 
Check it out The FUTURE RAVE ⚡️ Remix of ‘Let’s Love’ with @sia 🙌🏼
https://t.co/YeblETmyyY https://t.co/TK6TEspOmp
Mark your calendars for the debut "Future Rave" B2B set from @davidguetta and @MORTENofficial ⚡ https://t.co/i8RATbXrX4
.@davidguetta and @MORTENofficial are too good together as they give “Let’s Love” with @Sia a Future Rave update ⚡️ | 📸 via Ushuaïa https://t.co/gyS6hNNRlz https://t.co/Cjsz6ozFFA
